amendment.description: An amendment numbered 52 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit federal funds for training on diversity, equity, and inclusion.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit federal funds for training on diversity, equity, and inclusion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 221 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Gaetz.
